metadata.name: Potential Recon Activity Via Nltest.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\nltest.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('nltestrk.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('server')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('query')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/user')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('all_trusts')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dclist:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dnsgetdc:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('domain_trusts')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dsgetdc:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('parentdomain')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trusted_domains'))))

output.summary: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration use but user and host must be investigated References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2012-r2-and-2012/cc731935(v=ws.11), https://thedfirreport.com/2021/08/16/trickbot-leads-up-to-fake-1password-installation/, https://thedfirreport.com/2020/10/18/ryuk-in-5-hours/, https://book.hacktricks.xyz/windows/basic-cmd-for-pentesters, https://research.nccgroup.com/2022/08/19/back-in-black-unlocking-a-lockbit-3-0-ransomware-attack/, https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/03e231a6-74bc-467a-acb1-e5676b0fb55e.html, https://redcanary.com/blog/how-one-hospital-thwarted-a-ryuk-ransomware-outbreak/, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/5360c9d9ffa3b25f6495f7a16e267b719eba2c37/atomics/T1482/T1482.md#atomic-test-2---windows---discover-domain-trusts-with-nltest
